name: Intro
_source: music;TGAA ~ Court is Now in Session
speak;Cres;Why, is it a representative of Lord Sages?|I seem to recall you... Sal?
speak;Sal;Well, yes...|Lady Cres, right? I remember you visiting from Grahment before.
speak;Cres;That's right. It is so nice to see you, I trust Sages is well?
speak;Sal;Not such, his illness is worsening.|Hence my being here in his place.
speak;Sal;Thanks you, Cres.|Er, when does this whole thing start?
speak;Cres;Very soon! Were you any later, it would have been rather... faux pas.
speak;Sal;You can blame Sages' directions on that...|Oh! It's beginning!

speak;Jeremiah;Thank you attendees from our fellow countries.|I am touched to see the solidarity in watching a new dawn for Aurelia.|The Goddess, our divine creator, has blessed the royal lineage for centuries...|Now it is your turn, prince Elias, to become King and spread her graces!

speak;Elias;Thank you, Archbishop Jeremiah, and everyone else in attendence.|I may be young, but I have inherited my father's passion for this country's prosperity.|I hope that we may all have fruitful relations and mutual growth across the Goddess's lands.
speak;Jeremiah;Now, it is time to crown you, Milord!|Are you ready to solemnly devote your life to the Goddess and her country?
speak;KingSlayer;Heheheha! Take this, Aurelian scum!|For Lord Sages!
speak;Jeremiah;Wh-what? MILORD!|Oh Goddess... Please save him...
speak;EliasDead;Please brighten the future...|Let our citizens bathe in the golden light...|Argento... You must help her...|I see... bright... fleeting...
speak;Argento;It will be done... I will carve a path to our salvation... I promise.
speak;Jeremiah;What manner of demon would cause this...|Did he not say... "Lord Sages"?|You... Arcein...
speak;Sal;This must be some sort of ruse?! He would never!
speak;Oberon;So, you better explain yourself. Before you pay in blood.
speak;Jevil;What manner of chaos did you wish to cause?
speak;Emeline;YOU WILL PAY! EVERYONE, AFTER HER!|MY BROTHER... AAAAAAAAAAAAH!

speak;Cres;I agree, but you might want to run, they're not thinking straight!|You'll be allowed sanctuary in Grahment, I'll try and smoothe this heat over for you.|The Sages I know would never organise this kind of hit job...
speak;Esteban;I will have them on a platter for you, your highness.
speak;Skill;GAH! Arcein dastards! I will crush them as you wish, your brilliance!
speak;Emeline;*Sniff* Oh thank you Sir Skill!
speak;Cornelius;Run all you wish, cockroach.|You cannot scurry away from divine punishment.
